wiki.content: "Gravity" is a song by American singer-songwriter guitarist John Mayer and is featured on two of his releases: the 2005 live album Try! by the John Mayer Trio and his 2006 studio album Continuum. In January 2007, the song was released as the third single from Continuum. "Gravity" was #84 on Rolling Stone Magazine's list of the 100 Greatest Guitar Songs of All Time. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Gravity" is a song by American singer-songwriter guitarist John Mayer and is featured on two of his releases: the 2005 live album Try! by the John Mayer Trio and his 2006 studio album Continuum. In January 2007, the song was released as the third single from Continuum. "Gravity" was #84 on Rolling Stone Magazine's list of the 100 Greatest Guitar Songs of All Time.
